project.title: Authority communications
project.content:
Waking up quickly

Buying a BMW means making lots of choices. Not only the regular color and trim choices, but also what take on a model I want. Two similarly capable car models can have different expressions. Therefore we started out bold, there is a BMW for almost any personality.

project.intro: MSB has been commissioned by the government to coordinate authority communication during society impacting events. Through user research with communication officers from multiple authorities, participation in crisis exercises and a close dialogue with the internal communications coordinators at MSB, an entirely new communications tool was created. I was involved from strategies and user journeys to high definition prototypes.
